entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
